Package game.match

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CanBet
    Class CanBet represents a state, in which the legal commands are: bet (b), credit ($) and statistics (s).
    CanDealCards
    Class CanDealCards represents a state, in which the legal commands are: deal (d), credit ($) and statistics (s).
    CanHoldCards
    Class CanHoldCards represents a state, in which the legal commands are: hold(h),advice(a),credit($) and statistics(s)
    Match
    Match class represents the actual match of the game.
    Payout  
    Reader
    Reader class represents the class responsible for reading the given card and command file.
    State
    Abstract class State represents an abstract type that defines the possible actions at a certain part of the match.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IllegalException
    IllegalException class represents the Exceptions that can be thrown.
